DOC.brief_title: The $ Ensible Weight Program : An Intervention Tailored Low Income Women
DOC.detailed_description: Low income woman great risk obesity food insecurity ( consistent access nutritious adequate amount food ) . Most weight loss program target low income woman focus gain skill knowledge reduce food insecurity . Eligible participant randomize one two group . The two group follow different weight management program . One group follow standard weight management program . The group follow investigation program , $ ensible Weigh Program . Participation study last 9 month .
DOC.criteria: Documented low income Body Mass Index ( BMI ) > 25.0 kg/m2 Must speak understand English Able attend intervention session access telephone Report serious medical risk insulindependent diabetes , cancer , recent cardiac event Currently plan become pregnant intervention Have control food purchase choice Report participation weight reduction program involve diet PA within past 6 month Report symptomology eat disorder Report adherence specialize diet regime , i.e. , multiple food allergy , vegetarian , Atkins , macrobiotic , etc .
